inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getContactFlowModule.

contactFlowModuleId.description: Returns information on a specific Contact Flow Module by contact flow module id

instanceId.description: Reference to the hosting Amazon Connect Instance

name.description: Returns information on a specific Contact Flow Module by name

tags.description: Map of tags to assign to the Contact Flow Module.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getContactFlowModule.

arn.description: ARN of the Contact Flow Module.

content.description: Logic of the Contact Flow Module.

description.description: Description of the Contact Flow Module.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

state.description: Type of Contact Flow Module Module. Values are either `ACTIVE` or `ARCHIVED`.

status.description: Status of the Contact Flow Module Module. Values are either `PUBLISHED` or `SAVED`.

tags.description: Map of tags to assign to the Contact Flow Module.
